dataset_id: RLC Forest Fire Locations in Eastern Russia, 1998-1999
title: RLC Forest Fire Locations in Eastern Russia, 1998-1999
summary: This dataset is derived from Russian forest fire imagery from the National Forest Fire Center of Russia archive that was collected by the Center of Remote Sensing, Institute of Solar Terrestrial Physics, Irkutsk, Russia for the 1998 and 1999 fire seasons. The data are vector (point) maps of forest fire locations (1998 and 1999) in ArcView shapefile format.
